children.name: Envise is committed to ensuring your privacy is protected. This privacy policy sets out how Envise will use and protect any information that you provide to Envise when you register for this site. This privacy policy applies solely to information collected through our Website.

Envise collects certain personally identifiable information, such as name, email address, mailing address, when you complete the registration form, on this Website. This information is used to provide you with any services to which you subscribe, send you periodic emails containing information, company news, updates, related service information, event information, etc., to administer surveys, promotions, process transactions and provide access to privileged areas of the Website.

We will not sell, distribute or lease your personal information to third parties, without your permission. This does not include trusted third parties who assist us in operating our Website, conducting our business or servicing you, so long as those parties agree to keep this information confidential. We may also release your information when we believe release is appropriate to comply with law, enforce our site policies, or protect ours or others rights, property or safety.

Third party links may be included on our Website. These third party sites have separate privacy policies. Envise is not responsible or liable for the content, activities or privacy practices of such other sites. We encourage our users to be aware when they leave our site and to read the privacy statements of any other site.

Envise may change this privacy policy from time to time by updating this page. We advise you to check this page to view our most recent privacy policy. This privacy policy is not intended to, and does not create any contractual or other legal rights in or on behalf of any party.

How long we retain your Personal Data depends on the type of data and the purpose for which we process the data. We will retain your Personal Information for the period necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law.
By using our Website, you consent to our privacy policy.
